items.name: collectExternalDecoratorModules
items.signature: function collectExternalDecoratorModules(code: string, requireFn: RequireFunction): string[]
items.description:
Collects decorator modules from external macro packages referenced in the code.

This function parses macro import comments in the code to find external packages,
then loads their manifests and collects all decorator module names.

params.name: code
params.description: The TypeScript source code to scan

params.name: requireFn
params.description: Optional custom require function for loading external packages

returns.description: Array of decorator module names from external packages
